item.description:
Note to anyone contemplating a Jewish studies publishing project with potentially broad interest in rye Jewish community: We promise not to do this. https://t.co/0AskCnJybi
I would probably price this around $180-200 for the hardcover edition. With a paper edition released two years after at half that.
Obviously, I don’t know everything that goes into academic publishing beyond copywriting, typesetting, proofreading, and getting comments from peer reviewed. But happy to learn.
This is less about this Mishna translation and commentary than about the feminist Talmud commentary which would be having much more impact at $30/volume.
So if you’re in the planning stages for the next prestige academic Jewish text publishing project, drop a line. Our DMs are open.
